tool.name: vSNP: statistics
tool.command: #import re #set read1_identifier = re.sub('[^\s\w\-]', '_', str($read1.element_identifier)) #set read2_identifier = re.sub('[^\s\w\-]', '_', str($read2.element_identifier)) #if str($read_type_cond.read_type) == "single": ln -s '${read1}' '${read1_identifier}' && #else: ln -s '${read1}' '${read1_identifier}' && ln -s '${read2}' '${read2_identifier}' && #end if python '$__tool_directory__/vsnp_statistics.py' #if str($read_type_cond.read_type) == "single": --read1 '${read1_identifier}' #if $read1.is_of_type('fastqsanger.gz'): --gzipped 'true' #end if #else: --read1 '${read1_identifier}' --read2 '${read2_identifier}' #if $read1.is_of_type('fastqsanger.gz') and $read2.is_of_type('fastqsanger.gz'): --gzipped 'true' #end if #end if --samtools_idxstats '$samtools_idxstats' --vsnp_azc '$vsnp_azc' --output '$output'
tool.help:
**What it does**
Calculates vSNP statistics for fastqsanger VCF files.
